II. METHODOLOGY

10/09/2002 Comment
The agency was originally located at 28303 Joy Road Westland
Michigan The agency moved to 23077 Greenfield Southfield
Michigan, then back to 28303 Joy Road within six months.
III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
The independent living program is housed in a large office building with other Spectrum
Human Services Inc. programs. The office space is adequate. The program continues
to grow and the program manager reported that there might be another move in the
near future. The previous license number is CB630247045.
B. Program Description
The agency provides services to male and female youth 16 and older. Most of the
youth serviced by this program have been in the system for many years and are
inappropriate for placement in foster care or residential treatment. Some of the youth
are placed in small group homes in the community with 24 hour staffing. Other youth
are boarders with families. Some youth live in apartments with and without roommates.
The agency recently added a mother-baby program.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
Not applicable
IV. RECOMMENDATION
The recommendation is for the issuance of a Regular License.
